properties.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Perry, AL; Dallas, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:16AM CST until February 20 at 12:21AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River At Centreville Affecting Bibb...Dallas and Perry
Counties.

.Heavy rainfall during the past 24 hours is producing rises along
the upper Cahaba River...and a flood warning is now in effect for the
Cahaba River at Centreville.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River At Centreville.
* from this morning to late tonight...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  6:15 AM Wednesday The stage Was 20.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 23 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 23.1 feet by this afternoon. The river will fall
below flood stage by this evening.
* Impact...At 23 feet...Pasture lands begin to flood in the
Centreville area.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
